message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this extraordinary opportunity to you. The product I'm offering is not just any item; it's a unique piece that holds immense value and significance to me. It's worth more than $10000 to me, but I understand its true worth might be different for you. Considering its uniqueness and the effort put into it, I am willing to extend an offer of $15000 for it. This price reflects my belief in its value and my desire to see it go to someone who will appreciate it as much as I have. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to hearing from you soon.
